name: entropedia-companion
description: A browser extension for the entrance to your Entropedia-Space
author: Entropedia contributors <contributors@entropedia.org>

scripts.build-bra: mkdir -p ./dist/bra && rm -rfv ./dist/bra/* && cp -r ./webext/bra/* ./dist/bra && cp -r ./bundle/* ./dist/bra && web-ext lint -s ./dist/bra && web-ext build -s ./dist/bra -n brave_v$(.companion/companion.sh node_version).zip
